panels.description: Total Connected Peers for both inbound and outbound (per peer).

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (velor_connections{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"})

panels.title: Total Connected Peers (Inbound + Outbound)

panels.description: Total Inbound connected peers (i.e., peers that have dialed us).

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (velor_connections{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="inbound"})

panels.title: Inbound Connected Peers

panels.description: Total outbound connections (i.e., peers that we've dialed).

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(velor_connections{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="outbound"})

panels.title: Outbound Connected Peers

panels.description: The number of rejected inbound connections (per second).

targets.expr: rate(velor_connections_rejected{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"})[1m]

panels.title: Rejected Inbound Connections (per second)

panels.description: Value is > 0 if there is a mismatch between onchain and actual network key on the interface

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (velor_network_key_mismatch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"})

panels.title: Network Key Mismatches

panels.description: Inbound number of bytes received on the network

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])

quantile(0.5, rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

quantile(0.99, rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

quantile(0.1, rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

panels.title: Network Inbound bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of bytes sent on the network

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])

quantile(0.5, rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

quantile(.99, rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

quantile(.1, rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

panels.title: Network Outbound bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total number of inbound bytes received on the network

targets.expr: rate(sum by (metrics_source, namespace, kubernetes_pod_name, role_type) (velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}))[1m]

panels.title: Total Network Inbound bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total number of outbound bytes received on the network

targets.expr: rate(sum by (metrics_source, namespace, kubernetes_pod_name, role_type) (velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}))[1m]

panels.title: Total Network Outbound bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Inbound number of messages received on the network

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])

panels.title: Network Inbound messages (messages/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of messages sent on the network

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])

panels.title: Network Outbound messages (messages/s)

panels.description: Total number of inbound messages received on the network

targets.expr: sum by (metrics_source, namespace, kubernetes_pod_name, role_type) (rate(velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total Network Inbound messages (messages/s)

panels.description: Total number of outbound messages received on the network

targets.expr: sum by (metrics_source, namespace, kubernetes_pod_name, role_type) (rate(velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total Network Outbound messages (messages/s)

panels.description: Average size of each inbound message

targets.expr: velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]/velor_network_app_inbound_traffic_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]

panels.title: Average inbound message sizes

panels.description: Average size of each outbound message

targets.expr: velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]/velor_network_app_outbound_traffic_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",role_type=~"$role_type", network_id=~"$network_id", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m]

panels.title: Average outbound message sizes

panels.description: The time taken to serialize messages

targets.expr: velor_network_serialization_metric_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="serialization"}/velor_network_serialization_metric_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="serialization"}

panels.title: Average serialization time

panels.description: The time taken to deserialize messages

targets.expr: velor_network_serialization_metric_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="deserialization"}/velor_network_serialization_metric_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="deserialization"}

panels.title: Average deserialization time

panels.description: The latencies for serialization

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(velor_network_serialization_metric_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="serialization"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.70, sum(rate(velor_network_serialization_metric_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="serialization"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(velor_network_serialization_metric_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="serialization"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

panels.title: Serialization time

panels.description: The latencies for deserialization

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(velor_network_serialization_metric_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="deserialization"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.70, sum(rate(velor_network_serialization_metric_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="deserialization"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(velor_network_serialization_metric_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="deserialization"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

panels.title: Deserialization time

panels.description: The time taken to compress messages

targets.expr: velor_compression_operation_latency_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="compress"}/velor_compression_operation_latency_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="compress"}

panels.title: Average compression time

panels.description: The time taken to decompress messages

targets.expr: velor_compression_operation_latency_sum{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="decompress"}/velor_compression_operation_latency_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="decompress"}

panels.title: Average decompression time

panels.description: The latencies for compression

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(velor_compression_operation_latency_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="compress"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.70, sum(rate(velor_compression_operation_latency_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="compress"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(velor_compression_operation_latency_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="compress"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

panels.title: Compression time

panels.description: The latencies for decompression

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(velor_compression_operation_latency_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="decompress"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.70, sum(rate(velor_compression_operation_latency_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="decompress"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(velor_compression_operation_latency_bucket{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",operation="decompress"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

panels.title: Decompression time

panels.description: The compression ratios of sent network messages (i.e., compressed bytes / raw bytes)

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, client) (velor_compression_byte_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", data_type="compressed_bytes"}) / sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, client) (velor_compression_byte_count{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", data_type="raw_bytes"}) * 100

panels.title: Compression ratio (sent)

panels.description: Inbound number of bytes passed through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="allowed", direction="inbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Inbound Allowed bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of bytes passed through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="allowed", direction="outbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Outbound Allowed bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Inbound number of bytes rate limited through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="throttled", direction="inbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: VFN Public Network Inbound Throttled bytes (bytes/s)

panels.description: Outbound number of bytes rate limited through the throttler

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_rate_limit_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", metric="throttled", direction="outbound", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

panels.description: RPCs declined or canceled due to hitting max RPC capacity or max queue capacity.

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"(declined|canceled)"}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: RPC Messages Drop Rate

panels.description: The rate of new inbound connections on the network interface

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (rate(velor_network_pending_connection_upgrades{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="inbound" }[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Inbound Pending Connection Upgrades

panels.description: The rate of new outbound connections on the network interface

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (rate(velor_network_pending_connection_upgrades{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", direction="outbound" }[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Outbound Pending Connection Upgrades

panels.description: Latency of Inbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(velor_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="inbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Inbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P50]

panels.description: Latency of Outbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(velor_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="outbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Outbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P50]

panels.description: Latency of Inbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(velor_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="inbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Inbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P90]

panels.description: Latency of Outbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(velor_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="outbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Outbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P90]

panels.description: Latency of Inbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(velor_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="inbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Inbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P99]

panels.description: Latency of Outbound connection upgrades

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id, le) (rate(velor_network_connection_upgrade_time_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", direction="outbound",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Outbound Connection Upgrade Latency [P99]

targets.expr: sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="request",state="failed"}[$AggInterval])) / sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="request",state=~"(sent|failed)"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: RPC Total Request Error Rate (% requests in error)

targets.expr: sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="response",state="failed"}[$AggInterval])) / sum by(network_id, role_type, kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type="request",state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: RPC Total Response Error Rate (% responses in error)

panels.description: Total throughput of all Outbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id) (rate(velor_network_rpc_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Outbound RPCs (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total throughput of all Inbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_rpc_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Inbound RPCs (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Outbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", type="request",state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Outbound RPCs (msg/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Inbound RPC requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_rpc_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", type="request", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Inbound RPCs (msg/s)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(velor_network_outbound_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(velor_network_inbound_rpc_handler_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(velor_network_outbound_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(velor_network_inbound_rpc_handler_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(velor_network_outbound_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, network_id, role_type, le)(rate(velor_network_inbound_rpc_handler_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", protocol_id=~"$rpc_protocol",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",network_id=~"$network_id",role_type=~"$role_type"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.description: Total throughput of all Outbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: avg(sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.9, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.1, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Outbound Direct Sends (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total throughput of all Inbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: avg(sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.9, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval])))

quantile(0.1, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Throughput of Total Inbound Direct Sends (bytes/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Outbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Outbound Direct Sends (msg/s)

panels.description: Total number of all Inbound Direct Send requests per peer

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role_type, network_id)(rate(velor_network_direct_send_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~"$network_id", role_type=~"$role_type", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="received"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: Rate of Total Inbound Direct Sends (msg/s)

targets.expr: rate(velor_network_benchmark_direct_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="sent"})

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (haproxy_process_pool_used_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~".*",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role="haproxy"})

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (haproxy_backend_current_sessions{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~".*",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role="haproxy"})

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (haproxy_process_idle_time_percent{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~".*",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role="haproxy"})

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(haproxy_frontend_connections_total{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~".*", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role="haproxy"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name, __name__) (rate({__name__=~"haproxy_.*denied.*", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", network_id=~".*", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role="haproxy"}[$__rate_interval]))
